channel.title: Uncategorized – Mainak Bhattacharya
channel.description: a picture is worth a thousand words

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Dear Visitors, Hello people you guys and gals out there might be surprised “who the hell is this”? Well this is you who is visiting my site so as your host it’s my noble duty to wish you “hello” and that’s just what I have done. Enough beating about the bush lets get to our …

Hello world! Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Dear Visitors,

Hello people you guys and gals out there might be surprised “who the hell is this”? Well this is you who is visiting my site so as your host it’s my noble duty to wish you “hello” and that’s just what I have done.

Enough beating about the bush lets get to our introduction straight. I am Mainak Bhattacharya, the proprietor of this website, working as software engineer and of course your friend.

This site, as you will know once you have explored it, is not a site that advertises for profit, neither is it a site trying to spread my popularity. This is just one of my attempts to communicate with people around the world and helping them in ways possible and within my capability.

I write and publish some technical article and application written in various technologies, self-made or published by legal permission, so that all of you can read it, download the application and take some advantages from them. Specially for my friends.

I feel privileged that you people spending your precious time checking my website. Please let me know if you find any thing useful. As that would make me happy.

Finally, please spare a little bit of your time to sign my guestbook.

Have a nice day !
